thread.title: Gov. Cuomo’s Proposed New Tips Rule: Follow the Money

author: wsjcom
title: Gov. Cuomo’s Proposed New Tips Rule: Follow the Money
text:
Dawn Lafreeda’s response to New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s concern for waitstaff sexual harassment is naive (“Don’t Blame Tips for Sexual Harassment,” op-ed, April 13). Consider that taxation of waitstaff tipping is dependent on the relative honesty of individuals, and the verification of tips received would be difficult and costly.
The restaurant, however, is more easily audited. The tips are recorded as part of the transaction and the amount of tax dollars would most likely increase. The correct phraseology for this system...
